A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Having those little comedic moments in starwars isn't new. In the past they've been used at the right time in the right moments and with the right characters. In this steaming pile of shit of a movie they just keep coming\, non-stop. Overwhelming in fact. 
Nothing really happens for the first hour or so of the movie. 
Annoying animal aliens come back stronger than ever.
The animals seem to be able to identify who the good guys are and can perceive incomprehensible dangers to them.
They ruined snoke completely.
The first orders tactics are at their worst. How is it the officers in command are so incompetent?
There are far worse sins for this movie but I don't want to spoil the main parts of the movie. Not that they add any actual depth to the story or anything though. There's just a few stupid surprises in there which mean absolutely nothing at the end of the day.
